## PoiManager.addImageTexture() method

Add an \[\[ImageTexture\]\] such that it is available as a named entity for techniques in theme files.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addImageTexture(imageTexture: ImageTexture): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  imageTexture | [ImageTexture](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.md) | \[\[ImageTexture\]\] that should be available for POIs. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
